::KitKat::

She looked at Drillbit. She looked at LandMine.  She walked over to 
Land mine and hugged her. "I'm so sorry my friend. He was a great 
warrior.  We shall all miss him."  She  hugged her friend and tried 
to comfort her.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit broke the hug, and turned to KitKat.
> "Well, Time Bomb died, on the way back here." He says, with a sad 
voice.
